trans-unit.source: Identifies the class that performs validation on an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that is subject to validation.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ActivityValidatorAttribute class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute"></xref> class by using the type of the validator.

For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute"></xref> class by using the specified validator type name.

For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidatorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Gets the name of the type of the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class.
The name of the type of the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class.
